card_text: If you control exactly 2 monster card types (among Fusion, Synchro, and/or Xyz): Apply the following effect based on those types.$N●Fusion and Synchro: Special Summon 1 "Outer Entity" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, and if you do, attach this card to it as material.$N●Synchro and Xyz: Special Summon 1 "Elder Entity" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.$N●Xyz and Fusion: Special Summon 1 "Old Entity" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck.$NYou can only activate 1 "Forbidden Trapezohedron" per turn.
